segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicating the beginning of the message and identifying the consignment for which status is being requested.
DTM, A segment indicating the date/time of the message and the dates, times and periods relating to the requested status or events.
LOC, A segment identifying a place/location which applies to the consignment such as consignment origin and destination.
RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the requested status, e.g. customer reference number.
TDT, A segment identifying conveyance relating to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.
EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to the requested status or event such as a container.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify the parties related to the consignment.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party to the consignment such as a shipper, consignee, freight forwarder, broker.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to indicate contacts related to the party.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to provide information about specific consignments, e.g. included in a consolidation.

segment.documentation: CNI, A segment to indicate a consignment (in a consolidation) using the reference number of its transport document.
DTM, A segment to indicate the date/time of the transport document of this consignment and the dates, times and periods relating to the requested status or events.
LOC, A segment identifying a place/location which applies to the consignment such as consignment origin and destination.
RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the requested status, e.g. customer reference number/order.
TDT, A segment identifying conveyance relating to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.
EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to the requested status or event such as a container.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify the parties related to this consignment.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party to the consignment such as a shipper, consignee, freight forwarder, broker.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to indicate contacts related to the party.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a department or a person to whom communication should be directed.
